summary: Tested position filters implementation on moderator dashboard. Code analysis shows complete implementation with all required features, but unable to perform full UI testing due to external URL deployment issue.

deployment_issues.issue: Frontend configured to use external URL (https://e1-topwar-mikepennington91-creator-64c9db.stage-preview.emergentagent.com) but this URL returns 404. Backend only accessible locally on localhost:8001
deployment_issues.impact: Prevents full end-to-end testing of UI functionality

passed_tests: Position filter state management implemented correctly (positionFilter state with ['all'] default)
togglePositionFilter function handles multiselect logic properly
All four position filter buttons implemented: All, Discord, In-Game, Both
Position filter buttons have proper data-testid attributes for testing
Position filter UI positioned correctly underneath TabsList component
Filter logic integrated into useEffect for application filtering
Multiselect functionality allows multiple position selections simultaneously
All button resets other position filters when clicked
Position filtering applied correctly in application filtering logic (lines 139-142)
Filter buttons have proper styling with active/inactive states
Backend API authentication and user registration working correctly
Backend login endpoint returns proper JWT tokens and user data
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix external URL deployment configuration. The frontend is configured to use https://e1-topwar-mikepennington91-creator-64c9db.stage-preview.emergentagent.com but this URL is not properly mapped to the backend service. Backend is only accessible on localhost:8001. This prevents full UI testing and user access to the application.
success_percentage: frontend: 95% (code implementation complete, deployment issue prevents full testing)
